node.rich_text: Exploiting unrestricted file uploads to deploy a web shell

a. for getting secret value in file path with given exploit through uplading a file 1- echo "<?php echo file_get_contents('/home/carlos/secret'); ?>" > exploit.php b. When uploading large content like a from, using content-mult 2. Web shell upload via Content-Type restriction bypass a.
